text: Patrice Loko (born 6 February 1970) is French former footballer who played as a striker. He began his career at Nantes and then moved on to Paris Saint- Germain, where he was part of the team that won the 1996 Cup Winners' Cup and lost to Barcelona in the 1997 Cup Winners' Cup final. From there he went on to play for Montpellier, Lyon, Troyes, FC Lorient and Ajaccio. He also made appearances for the French national football team, including scoring at Euro 1996 against Bulgaria. ==International goals== {| class="wikitable" |- ! # !! Date !! Venue !! Opponent !!
